name: Meat Briouates
steps: In a pan, saut√© the chopped onion in oil. Add the minced meat, the bouquet garni (coriander and parsley), salt, pepper, and cinnamon.
Cook until the meat is browned and the liquid has evaporated.
Add the beaten eggs to the meat. Mix until the eggs are cooked and well combined with the meat (the filling should be dry). Let it cool.
Cut the brik pastry sheets in half or into strips (depending on the desired shape: triangle or roll).
Place a spoonful of filling at one end and fold into a triangle or roll.
Seal using a brush dipped in the beaten egg.
Heat the oil in a fryer. Fry the briouates on both sides until golden. Drain and serve hot.
